name: Colors Rhapsody
description:
A  simple puzzle platformer, control the hexagon, collect color circles to pass color walls, collect shards and avoid your past selves to  complete the levels.

Wanted to learn how to implement fmod and was able to do that in the project.

Music by scottgamesounds.com

May lag on WebGL, can play without lights for better performance, or better download and play!

The player may get stuck sometimes, restart using R.

How to Play

  • A , D  / arrow - move 
  • Space - jump
  • R - Restart

how I got to the concept: Celeste
